topic.title: All Items Index
topic.shortdesc: Lists all the items in the dictionary in alphabetical order.

body.p: The "All Items Index" lists all the items in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary in alphabetical order.

ul.li: Data Elements are shown in green
Data Sets are shown in orange
NHS Business Definitions are shown in blue
Supporting Information are shown in blue????????????????
Supporting Definitions are shown in blue????????????????

body.p: There is an "arrow‚Äù on each page which takes you back to the top of the "All Items Index" page.
